name: The Shadow's Terror RE-Release Demo
description:
What if you woke up one day and it was suddenly the 80s? What if you happened to wander into a hell unknown to mankind, but known to the shadow creatures as their home? They see your kind as a threat. The only way to survive? Survive their death games until you can escape their terror.

Heavily Inspired by the FNaF Series and the Analog Horror genreThis was originally made for one of my friends as a birthday game but i decided that the premise was actually cool so i thought "y'know what this can be EVERYONE's birthday game :)"

This game is made using Clickteam Fusion 2.5, so if your computer flags the game as potentially dangerous or anything of the sorts, just ignore it. It's a common bug among Clickteam Fusion games, sorry for any inconvenience.

This game is in development so if you find any bugs let me know :)

ALSO DOWNLOAD THE FONTS INCLUDED WITH THE GAME OR ELSE THE UI ELEMENTS AND TITLES WONT WORK AND THE GAME WILL BREAK!

With love, From Ozzan <3
